name: Endless Tower(Ludum Dare 48)
description:
In this endless deeper tower, how deeeeeep can you reach?

This game is made by me and my friend Vulcan. I mainly do the game design and graphic, and a little bit programming. Vulcan mainly do the programming part. Background music is made by sirkoto51 on freesound.org

A, D to move left, right

space to jump
